history.proof: split. - intros H x Ex. hauto lq: on use: Ropp_0, Rbar_abs_opp, Rbar_abs_pos, Rbar_opp_involutive, Rbar_opp_le, Rbar_opp_real, is_finite_correct, Rbar_le_refl unfold: real, is_lb_Rbar, Rbar_opp, is_finite, Rbar_abs, Rbar_inv. - intros H x Ex_neg. specialize (H (- x)). hauto lq: on use: Rbar_le_refl, Rbar_abs_neg, Rbar_abs_pos, Ropp_0, is_finite_correct, Rbar_opp_real, Ropp_involutive, Rbar_opp_le unfold: Rbar_abs, Rbar_opp, real, is_finite.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of Rbar_opp_le (Rbar_le (Rbar_opp _) (Rbar_opp _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
The LHS of Rbar_opp_lt (Rbar_lt (Rbar_opp _) (Rbar_opp _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Rbar_opp_le (Rbar_le (Rbar_opp _) (Rbar_opp _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment E : R -> Prop l : Rbar x : R H : (fun x : R => E (- x)) (- x) -> Rbar_le (- x) (Rbar_opp l) Ex_neg : E x Unable to unify "Rbar_le (- x) (Rbar_opp l)" with "Rbar_le l x".
In environment E : R -> Prop l : Rbar x : R H : (fun x : R => E (- x)) (- x) -> Rbar_le (- x) (Rbar_opp l) Ex_neg : E x Unable to unify "E x" with "Rbar_le l x".

original: split. - intros H x Ex. unfold Rbar_opp. specialize (H (- x)). rewrite Rbar_opp_le. intros Ex_neg. apply H. rewrite Rbar_opp_lt. apply Ex_neg. - intros H x Ex_neg. unfold Rbar_opp in Ex_neg. rewrite Rbar_opp_lt in Ex_neg. specialize (H (- x)). rewrite Rbar_opp_le in H. apply H. apply Ex_neg.
